document_data.caption: The Illithidscourge.
document_data.name: Lans Thuliaga
document_data.nicknames: Illithid Scourge, Friend of the Friendless
document_data.mainbody: '''Lans Thuliaga''' was a [[goliath]] warrior in the service of the [[Order of the Gauntlet]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Lans, known as Friend of the Friendless, was sent to fight [[demon]]s inside the [[Labyrinth]]. At one point, he was battling a powerful [[balor]] when he met the [[Heroes of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] and [[Linu La'neral]] and asked their help. Together they went down into the [[Chasm]] to fight the demon. However, after the defeat of the balor, Lans suddenly felt something taking control of his mind and, proclaiming his loyalty to [[Baphomet]], he went into a ''[[portal]]''. Later, but previously in the Heroes' perception of time, Lans, known as Illithid Scourge, led the demon armies to take control of the [[Maze Engine]] for his [[demon lord]] but was defeated and retreated.
